column4: well, I'm still having problems with grub... I lists an Ubuntu based OS as being Ubuntu n the menu list... I've changed the grub.cfg file, but after running update-grub2, it rewrote the file and relisted the other OS as being Ubuntu...
yeah, don't edit grub.cfg, because update-grub overwrites it...if you want manual entries, put them into /etc/grub.d/40_custom
